reason: Move directly to the target mug to assess its position and prepare for manipulation.
Lower the arm to the working height to position the end-effector for interacting with the target.
Pull the target mug toward the robot base to bring it into a better grasping position.
Lift the arm to a safe height after repositioning the target, preparing to approach for grasping.
Reset the hand to the default open posture to ensure proper finger configuration before grasping.
The target mug is now in a favorable position. Attempt to grasp it now.
Lift the arm to confirm the mug has been successfully picked up.
The target (mug) has been successfully grasped. The task is complete.
